characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance

characterDescription:
Tag is one of Tvlakv's mercenaries. He, along with Bluth, is a 'right hand man' to Tvlakv. Both are responsible for keeping the slaves in line and hitching the chulls to their harnesses for pulling the slaver's wagons.
When around commissioned troops, Bluth and Tag played their part, walking with their chests out and hands on their weapons. They shoved a few of the slaves into place, but stayed clear of Kaladin.
He was also one amongst Shallan's caravan across the Shattered Plains.

characterDetails.Personality: Tag appears to have a more devious temperament of the two mercenaries, appearing cold and uncaring.[citation needed]
